title: Sled
description: A sled, otherwise known as a toboggan or sledge.
apple_vendor_description: The sled emoji on Apple devices is depicted with a classic, polished wooden design, featuring subtle 3D shading that gives it a tangible feel. Its smooth, rounded runners and gently curved seat are rendered with realistic lighting, suggesting effortless gliding over snow. This emoji evokes feelings of winter fun, childhood nostalgia, and outdoor adventures, perfect for conveying excitement about the colder seasons or playful activities.
